articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Newly-built Pig Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Newly-built Pig Farm
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the pig farm built by Large Combined Unit 313 of the KPA.
					 This farm, in which all processes from feed making to supply of feed and water and control of temperature and humidity at pigpens are run by computer, is now turning out a large quantity of meat and processed meat, greatly contributing to the improvement of servicepersons' diet.
					
					 After being briefed on the farm before a map showing its panoramic view, Kim Jong Il went round the exterior and interior of the well-arranged farm to acquaint himself in detail with its construction and management and operation.
					
					 Expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the unit successfully built this modern farm by its own efforts, he highly estimated the soldier-builders' feats.
					
					 He made rounds of pigpens, feed processing shop, pork processing shop and other places of the farm to learn in detail about its technical equipment and raising condition. Very satisfied to hear that its employees have been producing various kinds of quality processed meat by making use of all by-products to supply them to the servicepersons, he appreciated their merits.
					
					 The servicepersons boundlessly loyal to the Party and the revolution have built many edifices of the Songun era in different parts of the country under the slogan "Let us take upon ourselves both the defence of the country and socialist construction!", making enormous contributions to building a rich and powerful nation, he noted, saying: The feats performed by our army will go down with the history of building a thriving nation.
					
					 He advanced important tasks that would serve as guidelines in managing and operating the farm.
					
					 The recently-built pig farms are modern livestock bases of practicability as they were designed through strict application of the principle of scientific accuracy and rely on stable feed sources, he said, adding that they provide a sure guarantee for considerably increasing the livestock production.
					
					 In order to produce more pork in the farm, it is important to thoroughly establish a scientific management system based on the advanced technology, he said, underlining the need to put the pig raising on a scientific basis to this end.
					
					 He stressed that it is essential to secure ample anti-epidemic facilities and establish the strict anti-epidemic system as anti-epizootic work is of special importance in increasing the livestock production.
					
					 Today our country has such solid material and technical foundations for radically increasing the pork production as the well-organized breeding system able to supply enough piglets of good breed, he said, calling for conducing the raising of pigs in a big way by taking advantage of such favorable conditions.
					
					 He earnestly urged all units of the KPA to launch on a wide scale the drive to further develop the stockbreeding and provide abundant diet to the precious soldiers.
					
					 He was accompanied by Generals of KPA Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Sports Science Library Opened
articles.content:
Sports Science Library Opened
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Recently a library of sports science opened in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The two-storied building is located in Chongchun Street in Pyongyang.
					
					 There are reading rooms and study rooms of information on sports events on the first floor.
					
					 Reading rooms are equipped with local and foreign books, newspapers and magazines in the form of original and excerpt.
					
					 One can use computers to access the library's database and read or borrow books, newspapers, magazines, translated materials and videos on sports games.
					
					 The second floor is home to an e-book reading room and a network server.
					
					 In the e-book reading room tens of people, at the same time, can read e-books or watch videos on game rules, international tournaments, latest sports scientific and technical information and world-famous coaches and athletes.
					
					 The library also has well-equipped picture hall and conference room.
					
					 The conference room is furnished with a comprehensive electronic control system so that it can provide good conditions for sports lecture, workshop, consultation, symposium, training course of coaches and referees and so on.
					
					 The library is capable of collecting latest pieces of sports information as quickly as possible and distributing them to relevant sports groups and teams.

articles.title: Slogan Illumining Shortcut to Strong Economy
articles.content:
Slogan Illumining Shortcut to Strong Economy
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The joint New Year editorial of Rodong Sinmun, Josoninmingun and Chongnyonjonwi, leading newspapers of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sets forth a slogan "Let us push back the frontiers of science and technology in all the sectors of the building of a great, prosperous and powerful country and leap higher and faster!"
					 Found in pushing back the frontiers of science and technology is a shortcut for putting all the sectors of the country including the economy, science and technology on the advanced level of the world and building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The slogan encourages the Korean people, who have rushed toward the goal of the building of a strong economy, with a renewed confidence and redoubled courage.
					
					 Last year they wrought world-startling miracles in the building of a strong economy through their efforts for pushing back the frontiers of science and technology.
					
					 Such high-speed hi-tech pieces of equipment as vertical machining centre and 5-axis machining centre have been produced by the Ryonha Machine Factory, the country's main producer of CNC machine tools.
					
					 The Chollima Steel Complex and the Taean Heavy Machine Complex introduced CNC technology in the existing 10,000-ton press and extra-large machine tools respectively to ensure the accuracy of products and increase productivity.
					
					 The Kusong Machine-Tool Plant has updated the production system in a comprehensive way, the Kumsong Tractor Plant has produced high-performance tractor accessories and many factories and enterprises in Jagang and North Phyongan provinces have put their machines and equipment on the CNC basis.
					
					 All the economic sectors and units of the country are striving hard to push back the frontiers of science and technology and leap higher and faster.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Sexual Slavery for Army
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Sexual Slavery for Army
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The recent survey conducted by researchers of "the Japanese Center on Accountability for War" of 2,000 books containing war records and reminiscences in the Diet library resulted in discovering more than 260 books dealing with facts about "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army, drawing the attention of the international community. 
					 Foreign press reports said the findings were of great historic value as they gave a detailed account of the fact that the Imperial Japanese Army was deeply involved in the system for using the "comfort women" such as the physical examination conducted by MPs of the army of "comfort women" and the comfort stations operated by them and sexual abuses, in particular. Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The above-said findings go to clearly prove the undeniable historic facts that Japan set up the above-said system for the Imperial Japanese Army during the Second World War, the first of its kind in world history, and enforced the policy of sexual slavery.
					
					 It is more than 20 years since the issue of "comfort women" for the Imperial Japanese Army began to be brought up for discussion in the international arena but still remains unsettled. This is attributable to the behavior of Japan which has not only refused to admit its crimes it committed in the past but run the whole gamut of tricks to evade the responsibility for them.
					
					 The truth of history is sure to be clarified whether the Japanese reactionaries like or not and their evil doings will rebound on themselves.
					
					 Now that it has become clear the most evil doings in history were perpetrated by the Japanese government and military in an organized manner Japan can never evade its state responsibility for them and it deserves a stern punishment under international law.
					
					 The word play being resorted to by Japan over its past crimes only betrays its moral vulgarity in the eyes of the international community.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to promptly opt for redressing its past crimes as required by justice and human conscience and bear in mind that this offers it the last chance of resurrection.

articles.title: S. Koreas' Saber Rattling Flailed
articles.content:
S. Koreas' Saber Rattling Flailed
Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers have staged large-scale war maneuvers against the DPRK since the outset of the year, raising a hue and cry over "infiltration" and "provocation". Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					This is a deliberate provocation to torpedo the process for improving the north-south relations by screwing up the tensions and a treacherous act to dampen the desire for national reconciliation, unity and reunification through war maneuvers targeted against the north.
					
					What is needed in the north and the south is not war maneuvers but dialogue and cooperation for facilitating the process to warm the relations between them.
					
					It is unpardonable for the south Korean military warmongers to persist in their provocative war maneuvers against the other party to dialogue, throwing a wet blanket over the efforts of the DPRK to achieve national reconciliation and unity and improve the inter-Korean relations. The war maneuvers kicked off by them are a clear indication that the south Korean authorities are set to persistently rush headlong into inter-Korean confrontation and war for aggression against the north in the new year, too.
					
					The situation goes to clearly prove who is to blame for the hurdles lying in the way of improving inter-Korean relations.
					
					Their act of steadily deteriorating the inter-Korean relations through confrontation and war moves cannot be construed otherwise than a foolish act of those who are unable either to assess the changed situation on the Korean Peninsula or foresee their future.
					
					The anti-reunification forces of south Korea had better stop running riot, cogitating about the grave consequences to be entailed by their treacherous confrontation and war moves going against the times.

articles.title: Advance for Improving People's Living Called for
articles.content:
Advance for Improving People's Living Called for
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex in a letter addressed to all other working people of the country firmly pledged themselves to make this year a year of leap forward and spectacular success for it and ardently called upon all the working people to bring about a landmark turn in improving the people's standard of living and thus make significant October a month of happiness and joy.
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial says that all the party members and other working people should dynamically accelerate the advance for effecting a great surge in the drive for improving the people's standard of living in hearty response to the ardent call of the workers of the complex for glorifying this year as a great year of prosperity to be specially recorded in the history of
						 Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-said letter is a militant appeal powerfully arousing all the people to a drive for implementing the tasks proposed in the joint editorial and a manifestation of the strong will of the working class of the DPRK to make every possible effort to translate the Party's plan and determination into a shining reality. 
					
					 "Every effort for improving the people's standard of living!" This slogan fully represents the unshakable political creed of the WPK and the steadfast faith of the working class of the DPRK boundlessly loyal to the Party and leader.
					
					The editorial underscored the need for all the party members and other working people to turn out as one, accepting the letter as a militant call of the WPK and thus more powerfully demonstrate before the whole world the might of their single-minded unity around General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the stamina of Songun Korea advancing by leaps and bounds towards a thriving nation.

articles.title: Improvement of People's Living Called for
articles.content:
Improvement of People's Living Called for
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The top principle of the activities of the Workers' Party of Korea is reflected in the joint New Year editorial which calls for bringing about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					The above-said top principle for the people implies the noble idea of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il for patriotism and devotion and their undying feats.
					
					 The present advance of a great surge for improving the people's standard of living is the successful embodiment of the top principle of the WPK's activities based on the Juche idea.
					
					 The WPK built the advantageous socialist system under which the broad popular masses lead a happy life altogether in its early days and has steadily consolidated it. It has led the drive to defend socialism to victories only, putting forward the Korean People's Army as the driving force of the revolution in order to firmly safeguard the country, genuine home to all the people including the workers, farmers and intellectuals and cradle of their happy life.
					
					 Enormous are the foundations for improving the people's standard of living, which the WPK has laid with an eye on today against all odds.
					
					 Now, it leads the advance for effecting a great surge to victory after unfolding unprecedentedly grand plans and operations to bring about a decisive turn in the people's standard of living. No force on earth can break the cohesion and unity of the WPK which holds aloft the slogan "Every effort for improving the people's standard of living!" and the people who regard the slogan "When the Party is determined, we can do anything!" as their firm faith.

articles.title: Great National Unity Called for
articles.content:
Great National Unity Called for
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should cement national unity and thus surely bring about a turning phase in national reunification movement this year which marks the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday urges this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Now is the time for all the Koreans to fully demonstrate the might of the Korean nation aspiring after national reunification by uniting close under the banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 There are ample conditions and possibilities for the Korean nation to achieve great national unity.
					
					 The homogeneity of the nation and its strong sense of independence and its excellent quality formed throughout its history spanning 5,000 years serve as a basis of the great national unity.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the declarations of the great national unity through which the Koreans declared before the whole world that they would reunify the country independently through their concerted efforts. They should thoroughly implement the inter-Korean declarations if they are to exalt the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and achieve its prosperity. 
					
					 All the classes, strata and bodies should hold brisk dialogues for national reunification and achieve firm solidarity and alliance under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself," going beyond their bounds. 
					
					 If the people of all social standings at home and abroad get reconciled and cooperate with one another, this will amount to a process of wiping out misunderstanding and distrust and building confidence and achieving national unity and cementing it.
					
					 It is only a handful of anti-reunification conservative forces that dislike national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 In order to achieve national unity it is essential to condemn the group of traitors standing in its way so that they may not be able to stay any longer.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday dedicates a signed article to the 20th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Some Tasks of Ideological Education of the Party". 
					 The work, published on Jan. 11, Juche 79 (1990), comprehensively expounds the ways to substantially conduct the education in the advantages of the socialist system of our country, the education in the Korean nation-first spirit, the education in revolutionary traditions and class education in conformity with the socio-political situation of the Korean revolution. 
					
					 Two decades since the publication of the work were the immortal annals in which the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il, who has strengthened the political and ideological positions of the Korean revolution with the might of ideology in every way, was powerfully demonstrated, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean People's Army and the Korean people made shining victory in the drive for defending socialism while frustrating the imperialist reactionaries' vicious sanctions and moves to stifle the DPRK. They also created the heroic epic of great leap forward and innovation with the faith in sure victory that if they overcome difficulty, they can enjoy happiness. These would have been unthinkable without the tested leadership of Kim Jong Il who instilled into them the idea and will to overcome the tempest of history.
					
					 His wise leadership whereby he brought about a great leap forward by dint of ideology lies in that he made sure that the principle of ideological education was firmly established as required by the era and its forms and methods were steadily improved. 
					
					 It is the firm will of Kim Jong Il to open the gate to a thriving nation without fail by speeding up to the utmost the advance of a great surge with the might of ideology, the article says, adding that the Korean people will dynamically advance toward the high peak of a thriving nation by leaps and bounds in the future, too, under his wise leadership.

articles.title: Struggle against Expansion of Drill Ground Vowed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against Expansion of Drill Ground Vowed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Joint Measure Committee of Civic and Public Organizations for Checking the Expansion of Mugon-ri Drill Ground in south Korea called a press conference in Phaju, Kyonggi Province, on Jan. 7 at which it declared its will to conduct the struggle against expansion of Mugon-ri drill ground to the last.
					 The committee said at the conference that the judicial authorities on the same day staged a trial of inhabitants in Ohyon-ri who struggled against the expansion of the drill ground, but this only proved the justice of their struggle.
					
					 Who should be put in the dock is none other than the authorities of the "Defense Ministry" and the police, its stooge, getting hell-bent on illegal plunder of land for expansion of the drill ground, it held.
					
					 The organization declared that it would fight it out to check the expansion of Mugon-ri drill ground.

articles.title: Chongryon Supports Joint New Year Editorial
articles.content:
Chongryon Supports Joint New Year Editorial
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) in Tokyo on Jan. 9 in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, its vice-chairmen and officials of Chongryon.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in his report that the basic spirit of the joint New Year editorial is to wage a general offensive for improving the people's standard of living to make this year a prosperous one full of people's happiness. 
					
					 The year 2010 will shine as a year of great changes to be specially recorded in the history of building a thriving nation in which the people's standard of living will be radically improved, a year of great prosperity in which people will enjoy greater happiness and a year of great victory which will go down in the history of the nation.
					
					 The main orientation of Chongryon's work this year is to greet the 22nd Congress of Chongryon as one of victory and unity, inheritance and innovation and effect a decisive turn in cementing the overall foundation for ushering in a new heyday in the movement of the Koreans in Japan in the new century, he noted, and continued:
					
					 This year the officials of Chongryon will make a tangible contribution to the work for achieving the country's reunification in the idea of "By our nation itself" and the work for developing the nation's science and technology and agriculture and improving the people's standard of living, deeply aware of the patriotic duty they assumed for the country and nation.
					
					 He declared that they would struggle to get the Japanese authorities roll back their hostile policy towards the DPRK and lift the unreasonable sanctions like the ban on the portcall of the ship "Mangyongbong 92" and make a positive contribution to boosting the friendship and exchange between the two peoples of the DPRK and Japan.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					A letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Koreans in China Pay Tribute
articles.content:
Koreans in China Pay Tribute
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Koreans in China laid floral baskets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at Jilin Yuwen Middle School on the occasion of the New Year.
					 Attending it were Chairperson Choe Un Bok and officials of the General Association of Koreans in China, representatives of the Federation of Korean Economic Workers in China and the Federation of Korean Youth in China, compatriots residing in Jilin City, the DPRK consul-general to Shenyang and staff members of his consulate general and members of the DPRK branches in China.
					
					 The participants placed the floral baskets and bouquets and made bows to the statue.
					
					 Meanwhile, officials of the General Association of Koreans in China and compatriots residing in Shenyang laid floral baskets before the portraits of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il at the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang to pay tribute to them.

articles.title: DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Hailed
articles.content:
DPRK's Joint New Year Editorial Hailed
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Pioneer Party of Indonesia and the People's Rally for Socialism of Democratic Congo respectively issued statements on Jan. 5 in support of the joint New Year editorial published by newspapers of the party, the army and the youth of the DPRK.
					 The Pioneer Party of Indonesia noted in its statement that the joint editorial underscored the need for all the Korean people to carry on the vigorous drive with redoubled efforts once again and thus bring about a radical turn in improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 The editorial also called upon all the Koreans to actively promote national reconciliation and cooperation under the slogan "Let the entire nation unite under the banner of north-south joint declarations and achieve national reunification at the earliest date!" this year marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, it said, adding:
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve national reunification.
					
					 The People's Rally for Socialism of Democratic Congo in its statement said it is the precious fruition of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's strong independent faith and will, firm pluck and energetic revolutionary activities that last year the Korean people made epoch-making changes on all fronts and highly demonstrated the dignity of Songun Korea under the grim situation in which the imperialists' sanctions and moves to stifle the DPRK reached the extremes.
					
					 The statement expressed belief that the Korean people would significantly exalt this year, the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea, by bringing about a decisive turn in the development of light industry and agriculture in hearty response to the joint New Year editorial.
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and U Than Tun, director of the Union of Myanmar Economic Holdings Limited, released statements in support of the joint New Year editorial.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- One day in January Juche 56 (1967) General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to a poultry farm in Pyongyang.
					 When an official of the farm told him that chickens went to roost without feeding in darkness, he asked the official why the coops had not been lighted.   The question bewildered him.
					
					 Kim Jong Il said that every house of the farm villages had usually hung out an electric light under the eaves in summer evenings with the family members sitting in a circle, making straw ropes and chattering away happily, during which chickens had pecked at feed in the lighted yard. He then said they should make use of the chicken's behavior to fatten it up.
					
					 Saying that chickens would not go to roost early in the evening and keep feeding when coops were kept lighted, he noted that it did not need much work. 
					
					 After his guidance the official began raising chickens in the way indicated by the leader and came to know that a 63-day-old chicken gained 600 to 800 more grams in weight than in the previous way.

articles.title: Biblioteca de Ciencia Deportiva
articles.content:
Biblioteca de Ciencia Deportiva
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ATCC) -- Hace unos dias, en la avenida Chongchun de esta capital quedo inaugurada la Biblioteca de Ciencia Deportiva de dos pisos que es el centro de coleccion, estudio y divulgacion de las informaticas de ciencia deportiva.
					En el piso bajo hay la sala de lectura de libros y las de estudio de informacion por unidad de disciplinas.
					
					En la sala de lectura de libros estan exhibidos muchos libros de ciencia deportiva, periodicos y revistas escritos en coreano y en lenguas extranjeras en forma de textos originales, epitomes, etc.
					
					Los lectores pueden explorar alli los datos a traves de la computadora y gozar de servicio de leer y prestar los libros, periodicos, revistas, datos traducidos, videos de juegos por disciplinas, etc.
					
					En el primer piso se hallan la sala de lectura de libros electronicos y la de servidor de la red de la computadora.
					
					En la primera decenas de lectores pueden ver a la vez los libros electronicos y los videos sobre la regla de juego por disciplinas, el torneo internacional por disciplinas, ultimos datos de ciencia y tecnologia deportivas y otros sobre los entrenadores y los jugadores de fama mundial.
					
					 En la biblioteca estan arregladas bien la sala de proyeccion filmica y la de reuniones.
					
					Sobre todo, la sala de reuniones, dotada del sistema de control combinado de reunion electronica, es capaz de realizar en alto nivel la conferencia, el cursillo, la reunion consultiva de practica y el seminario de ciencia y tecnica, referentes a la labor del sector deportivo, el cursillo de solidaridad internacional, el de entrenador y arbitro, etc.
					
					Esta biblioteca tiene la capacidad de coleccionar rapidamente ultimos datos deportivos que pueden contribuir al desarrollo deportivo y ofrecerlos a cada disciplina.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela nuevos datos de las ex "consoladoras sexuales"
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela nuevos datos de las ex "consoladoras sexuales"
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ATCC) --   Recientemente, los investigadores del "Centro japones sobre la responsabilidad por la guerra" abrieron una pesquisa sobre 2 mil libros, que contienen los registros de guerra y las reminiscencias, archivados en la biblioteca de la dieta.
					Segun su resultado, aparecieron en 260 libros los datos sobre las ex "consoladoras sexuales" para el ejercito japones, que llaman la atencion de la sociedad internacional. 
					
					Al respecto, el rotativo Minju Joson publico en su edicion de este martes un comentario individual que sigue: 
					
					Segun las fuentes extranjeras, los datos recien revelados tienen gran valor historico porque narran en detalles que los gendarmes japoneses estaban a cargo del examen medico sobre las "consoladoras" y operaban las "casas de cita" con ellas, en particular, el ejercito japones estuvo profundamente involucrado en el abuso sexual y otras vejaciones provenientes de ese sistema de esclavitud sexual. 
					
					De esta manera, se confirmo claramente como innegable hecho historico que en el periodo de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, Japon practicaba la politica de "esclavizacion sexual" tras establecer el regimen de "consoladoras" para su ejercito, nunca visto antes en este planeta. 
					
					Ya pasaron mas de 20 anos desde cuando se comenzo a tratar en la arena internacional el problema de "consoladoras". Sin embargo, este problema no ha sido resuelto hasta la fecha, porque Japon se niega a reconocer sus crimenes historicos eludiendo de una manera u otra las responsabilidades por el respecto. 
					
					 Quieran o no los reaccionarios japoneses, la verdad de la historia sera aclarada y a los culpables les tocaran castigos correspondientes a sus crimenes.
					
					Puesto que quedo claro que esa fechoria peor de la historia fue organizada y ejecutada por el gobierno y la capa militar de Japon, este no puede evadir nunca la responsabilidad estatal sino debe ser enjuiciado en virtud del derecho internacional. 
					
					Si Japon recurre hasta a estas alturas a la charlataneria en cuanto a sus crimenes del pasado, demostraria por si solo a la sociedad internacional su bajeza moral. 
					
					Al escuchar la demanda de la justicia y la conciencia de la humanidad, Japon debe proceder ahora mismo a la liquidacion de sus crimenes del pasado dandose cuenta de que en ella esta el ultimo chance de su renacimiento.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena provocacion militar de belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena provocacion militar de belicistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ATCC) -- Desde el comienzo del ano nuevo, los belicistas surcoreanos libraron los ejercicios de guerra de gran envergadura hablando tanto de la supuesta "infiltracion" y la "provocacion" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea contra el Sur de Corea.
					Este hecho significa la provocacion malintencionada para obstaculizar la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur mediante la campana por agravar la tension y el acto criminal antinacional encaminado a sofocar con las detonaciones de los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC la aspiracion a la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion coreana.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					Lo que les hace falta ahora al Norte y al Sur de Corea, no es el alboroto armado sino el dialogo y la cooperacion para promover el mejoramiento de las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					Se trata de una insoportable locura la conducta de los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano que libraron esos ejercicios belicos provocativos a la RPDC, su contraparte del dialogo, desalentando los esfuerzos de ella por la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas. Tales maniobras insinuan abiertamente que las autoridades surcoreanas pretenden seguir marchando tambien nuevo ano por el camino de enfrentamiento y guerra contra el Norte como lo hicieron el ano pasado.
					
					La situacion comprueba claramente quien es el obstaculizador del mejoramiento de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					Agravar continuamente las relaciones intercoreanas con los ejercicios de enfrentamiento y guerra no es mas que una tonteria de los que no pueden prever el cambio de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana ni el futuro de si mismos.
					
					Las fuerzas anti-reunificacion del Sur de Corea deben actuar con prudencia reflexionando seriamente de la grave consecuencia que emanara de sus ejercicios militares vendepatrias que desafian a la epoca.

articles.title: Mejorar la vida del pueblo es el principio de actividades del PTC
articles.content:
Mejorar la vida del pueblo es el principio de actividades del PTC
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ATCC) -- En el editorial conjunto del Ano Nuevo, que llama a imprimir un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo dando otro acicate a la industria ligera y la agricultura, esta materializado el maximo principio de las actividades del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado en su edicion de este martes y prosigue: 
					
					Ese maximo principio por el pueblo sintetiza el noble ideal y las imborrables proezas, caracterizados por la abnegacion al pueblo, del Presidente         Kim Il Sung y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					La marcha de gran auge de hoy por la mejora de la vida del pueblo deviene la brillante materializacion del maximo principio de las actividades del PTC, basado en la idea Juche. 
					
					El PTC establecio ya hace tiempo el superior regimen socialista donde amplias masas trabajadoras viven felizmente y vino consolidandolo constantemente. 
					
					Para defender firmemente la cuna de autentica vida y felicidad de todo el pueblo, incluso la clase obrera, los campesinos y los intelectuales, el PTC condujo al unico camino de victoria la batalla de defensa del socialismo presentando al Ejercito Popular de Corea como grueso de la revolucion. 
					
					 Es muy grande la base para la mejora de la vida del pueblo, que vino sentando poco a poco el PTC previendo la realidad de hoy en medio de severas pruebas. 
					
					 Hoy dia, el PTC conduce a la victoria la marcha de gran auge trazando ambiciosos propositos e impulsando operaciones de una magnitud sin precedentes para mejorar la vida del pueblo. 
					
					No se puede quebrantar por nada la unidad entre el PTC, que sostiene en alto la consigna de "!Todo para la mejora de la vida del pueblo!", y el pueblo coreano que guarda como su firme conviccion el lema de "!Si el partido decide, lo cumplimos!".
